string-array.name: TubeCheckError
string-array.item: Check pass, pls click Complete to continue！
Yellow and White, Red and Orange, Blue and Green must be opposite！
There exist one Cube with identical color face！
There must be exactly one face at center for Yellow, White, Red, Orange, Blue and Green！
There is not exactly one facelet of each colour！
Not all 12 edges exist exactly once！
Flip error: One edge has to be flipped！
Not all 8 corners exist exactly once！
Twist error: One corner has to be twisted！
Parity error: Two corners or two edges have to be exchanged！
